thread.title: Driving local marketing change with Uber, Lyft and self-driving cars
thread.title_full: Driving local marketing change with Uber, Lyft and self-driving cars

author: Brian Smith
title: Driving local marketing change with Uber, Lyft and self-driving cars
text:
Columnist Brian Smith explains how ride-sharing services and self-driving cars will open up a host of new opportunities for local businesses.

Please visit Marketing Land for the full article.
